testsuite.name: Book Resource REST API Tests

testcase.name: when GET Book list, then returns 200
when POST a new Book, then returns 201
when POST an existing Book id, then returns 422
given Book id, when GET existing Book, then returns 200
given Book id, when GET non existing Book, then returns 404
